FuncDef: The display bgp routing-table cidr command displays classless inter-domain routing (CIDR) information about BGP routes.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the routing-table is in the BGP labeled address family.
-

Examples: Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, h - history,
i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin      : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
Network            NextHop                       MED        LocPrf    PrefVal Path/Ogn
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the classless inter-domain routing (CIDR) information about BGP routes, run the display bgp routing-table cidr command.
